Articles.Content:
Hello,

I took a hiatus from KSP for a few months for reasons, but now that 1.0 is coming out very soon, the hype train is keeping me back in.

Also I didn't make a new account because laziness. But I really like this forum and I'm super attatched to this game again. I even made a speedboat! ;D

tootles
From one Forum Newbie to another, Welcome to the party.

Welcome aboard! Probably best that you didn't make a new account though, that'd just be a tad redundant. Redundancy is good for rockets, but perhaps not for forum accounts. I'd love to see a picture of your speedboat, watercraft have always befuddled me! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Here ya go.

![6CD244EA246C5363C25567BC957ED69A986C6608](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/714161785552082259/6CD244EA246C5363C25567BC957ED69A986C6608/)

Aint it nice?

I'll get more pics later. It's top speed where it won't break is about 105 m/s
@moarpower Welcome back! Also, you \*might\* have enough intakes...
